attributes.action: Reinstate special needs schools, removing inadequate special needs support from mainstream schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Support for learning in mainstream schools is inadequate at providing education to children with special needs. Since the government cutbacks(closure of  special needs schools) learning support has been placed in the hands of mainstream schools, with support teachers only seeing children for a few hours a week. We petition for special educational needs children to be moved back to seperate schools where their needs will be met on a permanent, fulltime basis.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Reinstate special needs schools, removing inadequate special needs support from mainstream schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12998.asp
